name: Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners, v. CAPITAL BLUE CROSS, INC., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Herman v. Capital Blue Cross, Inc.

parties: Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners, v. CAPITAL BLUE CROSS, INC., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. It is also ordered that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is Vacated and the matter be Remanded to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration in light of Ciamaichelo v. Independence Blue Cross, 589 Pa. 415, 909 A.2d 1211 (2006).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
919 A.2d 912
Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners, v. CAPITAL BLUE CROSS, INC., Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 14, 2007.
